loggedon.title: Panel de administración
loggedon.scriptDiv: How to integrate it to your website:
loggedon.scriptDivTitle1: Script: simple login to the chat !
loggedon.scriptDivTitle3: You can also use direct link to your chat:
loggedon.scriptDivTitle4: Auto login as %s with sex:%s and url to avatar: %s
loggedon.loginToRoom: To login into a room, use the startRoom parameter. Ex to login into room2

freeAccount.text: You are using a FREE limited account:

menu.quiz: Juego de preguntas en el chat

config.enterChatMode: What kind of users can join the chat ?
config.allowQuickPrivateMessagesInPublicChat: Allow to send quick messages inside the global chat
config.pushToTalkMax: Max time(ms) an user can talk
config.urlProtection: Chat URL protection (enter URL if necessary)
config.externalCSSLink: Link to external CSS to customize your chat
config.hideMessageServerAfterNseconds: Hide Message Server After N seconds (put 0 for none)
config.guestTrialVersionOnly: Chat is in trial version for no registered users
config.guestTrialUrlWhenForbidden: Url to be redirected when users uses some trial functions
config.chatTypeL: What type of chat do you need ? (tab = private in tabs; window = private in window, conference = 1 video streamer and watchers, tabAndWindow = private text chat in tabs, webcams in draggable windows)
config.quitUrlL: Where to redirect when user quits chat
config.saveMessagesL: ALl messages will be saved to database
config.actionOnForbiddenWordL: What to do when foirbidden word is found
config.timerUserCanSendAgainL: Timer in milliseconds during user cannot send message again
config.forgottenEmailTemplateL: Template of message when user forgets his emails
config.fromEmailL: How should appear the email from when sending forgotten email
config.webcamPublicL: Should my webcam appear to anayone when switched on or on invitation only
config.webcamMaxL: Maximum of webcams displayed at the same time
config.privateOnlyOnInvitationL: Are private messages enabled or do I need to accept a private first ?
config.enterChatModeL: Can anyone enter the chat as guest or must an user first register ?
config.userMustConfirmEmailL: Should an user confirm his email to enter chat ?
config.bannedUrlL: Where banned user should be redirect to ?
config.webcamWidthL: Width in pxiels of the cam
config.webcamHeightL: Height in pxiels of the cam
config.showRandomAvatarsForGuestsL: Show random avatar image for guest or choose the gender icon instead ?
config.userCanRegisterL: If checked, then user can register by himself !
config.youtubePlayerL: If checked, admin can control the youtube player
config.displayPrivateButtonL: Show the private chat only button ?
config.displayWebcamPublicWebcamPrivateButtonsL: Display webcam public/webcam private group button ?
config.showQuickPrivateMessagesInPublicChatL: Should private messages be seen by everybody ?
config.timeoutBeforeTalkAgainL: Time in milliseconds before an user can Talk again
config.pushToTalkMaxL: Maximum time in milliseconds can user can talk
config.pushToTalkFreeHandL: Display checkbox to allow push to talk ?
config.pushToTalkFreeHandAdminOnlyL: Only admin can have push to talk feature.
config.urlProtectionL: Url where the chat will be excusively integrated. (leave blank if any website)
config.externalCSSLinkL: http(s) url to link to external CSS so you can customize your own chat look&feel)
config.showMessageServerL: Should messages like John has left the chat or Jerry has entered the chat should be displayed ?
config.guestTrialVersionOnlyL: Check it if you want to run your chat as trial version for users. Users will only be able to watch the chat and not able to send messages
config.guestTrialUrlWhenForbiddenL: Url to be redirected to when users tries to use chat and when they are not registered (like sending messages). These URL should lead to some register page or payment page. Leave it BLANK if no trial version required
config.showUserInfoDataUrlOrJavascriptL: Here you can add your link to display some info about an user. Use {username} as parameter. Ex: https://yoursite.com/infoUser.php?username = {username}
config.closePrivateChatWhenUserLeaves: Close private chat when user leaves
config.displayRoomsChoiceWhenEnterChat: Display rooms choice before enter the chat
config.displayChatHistory: Display chat history when enter room
config.uploadImages: Allow users to upload images into the chat

banned.danger1: You are using a FREE limited account: some fields are disabled or limited.

genders.image: Image 32x32 pixels of the gender (leave blank if none)
genders.canBroadcast: Can this gender broadcast his webcam to ALL users ?(ex: only female can broadcast to ALL users)

rooms.name: Name of the room
rooms.welcome: Welcome message of the room. You can use these variables: %, %, %
rooms.password: Put password to protect the room

users.username: Username of the user (do not user special chars)
users.bannedUntil: Set the date/hour until user is banned from the chat (or leave blank)
users.password: Set password or leave blank if none
users.role: Is user a normal or user or a moderator (kick/ban features)
